episodes.title: Escaped a Cult, Built a Vegan Empire | Sandra Nomoto’s Untold Story
episodes.description: What happens when you leave a cult and become a trailblazing vegan entrepreneur? In this episode, I sit down with Sandra Nomoto Filipina Canadian author of Vegan Marketing Success Stories, ex-cult member, and introvert turned powerhouse. We talk about her wild journey from cult life to building an ethical business, her vegan story from 2007 to fully plant-based in 2018, and what it’s like to be a quiet leader in a noisy world. Get ready for raw stories, real laughs, and inspiring advice for any vegan, introvert, or dream-chaser.
